none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 04, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 If you told me in 2009 that I would be posting hip-hop mix tapes with black metal imagery and SISTERS OF MERCY samples on this blog in 2023 I would have probably thought....."damn, sounds sick." So here you go: NEFARIOUS SCENARIOS. Nothing for the layman (read: me) to say other than....LISTEN to this. You have never heard a tape like this one, and you have never heard a collection of sounds so...interesting. I can't describe it, but I can tell you that it exists. CRIMINALIST

seo.title: Nefarious Scenarios - Criminalist - Terminal Escape
